phrases: We saw your article in the paper and your website!
You want to join the team?
You can clear away all the ash you want,
but the road to anti-aging is long.
To individuals wishing to join the Kansei University Long Distance Track and Field Team The Kansei University Long Distance Track and Field Team is not currently recruiting new members.
and I do not want to be influenced by any passing fads.
I do not have time to look after new members,
and I want to focus on the ten of us.
If anyone approaches you at school, politely turn them down.
We are drowning in interview requests, too.
Choose carefully from the offers and reject as many as you can.
Should not you be looking for a job?
I can only assume he is trying not to think about it.
We will continue doing whatever we started before the qualifier.
Can we discuss water station staff and volunteers later?
I am also thinking about checking out the course next weekend.
We cannot run it, but it is worth just looking at it.
Let us go to the hot springs on the way back.
We are playing soccer with some friends from language class.
But they will not have enough players.
Not even professionals can afford to run unprepared.
Is there any point in obsessing over it?
You have been tricking us, have not you?
When you recruited us, you said we would aim for the top!
Shinsei University 1021 Kanagawa International University 1003 Kansei University 1043 Oka University 1044 Yakuo University 1052
No matter how hard we try, we are not strong enough to beat the seeded teams!
It is impossible for us to win!
You knew that and wheedled us anyway, did not you?
You are right that I said we would aim for the top.
Is it really impossible for us to win no matter how hard we try?
Especially in long distance, it is rare to see an upset.
Even Rikudo's second team is way better than us.
But, depending on how you look at it, we are lucky.
No matter how fast you are, only a handful of runners get to run at Hakone.
But we made it through the qualifier.
We get to run at Hakone, just like we wanted.
There are plenty of people who would be jealous of that alone.
There is no point if we cannot win!
There is no point in competing when you already know the outcome!
Then you should not be playing soccer.
If you want to win, you should be training.
You think you are so great.
We are saying we cannot find the motivation to do that!
How can you say that after you could not respond the other day?
If you guys cannot run because you cannot win,
will you quit living because you will die someday?
What are you trying to say?
To be or not to be?
Kakeru the quibbler will never die.
What are we doing right now?
I thought you had a question for me.
You are right that I mentioned the top, but I did not mean we would win.
I am searching for that answer, too.
I am searching for the destination.
Kakeru, it is your turn to do the dishes.
It is because I could not answer them.
On the way home from the qualifier, they asked me why we are running.
Yeah, but it is like not being able to tell someone what the meaning of life is.
We made it through the qualifier.
We are running at Hakone together.
Maybe we have already achieved the first goal we set for ourselves.
But that was not the real top.
After all, I wanted to aim even higher with you guys.
But I hesitated to answer them.
We have not played soccer in forever.
We have just been running this whole time.
Now we just have to practice enough that they will not complain.
The guys who did not qualify?
I hope everyone shows up soon.
We got in the habit of waking up early.
But he is one of the best in the country!
He is running at us while smiling!
There is no way you were outrunning him.
I do not consent to this...
Section 1 Starting Line Yomiuri Shimbun Tokyo Office
The day of the race, the crowds on the sidewalk will be a hundred deep.
They will build a huge stage out front, and cameras will be pointed at the runners.
It is a truly grand occasion.
Will we have time to think about that?
It is not for the sensitive.
The wind between the buildings is fierce.
Our bodies will get cold quickly.
Twenty-one runners will begin running amidst the crowd,
thinking only of delivering their sash to their teammate waiting far ahead.
Do not they stop all the traffic here and turn this into part of the course?
It is way too much pageantry for a bunch of college students.
It means it is worth just that much.
Our running should be worthy of that.
Have you gotten better at driving?
I could not believe it, but you have, have not you?
It is not fair for me to only expect you guys to grow.
If you do not keep sucking at driving, we will not be able to make excuses anymore.
By the way, last year in this section 2,
Kofu's Iwanki and Rikudo's Fujioka put on a legendary sprint.
They call it the ace's section.
Do you want to run it?
as long as there is a road, I will run as hard as I can.
He said as long as there is a road.
Was what I said really that weird?
It is steeper than I imagined.
Going up this will be hell,
but this means the downhill is no joke, either, right?
Naturally, the strength of your legs are important in this section,
but your courage and intelligence matter, as well.
So the finish line is not at the top.
We are almost at the finish line of the first half.
Let us enjoy the scenery while we can.
First Half Finish Line (Section 6 Starting Line) Lake Ashi
The air at Aotake does not compare to this.
I wonder what it will be like the day of the race.
There will be screaming crowds, right?
You are even previewing the course.
I am sorry I called you plebs once.
Should you be loafing around here?
I am waiting for Group B to arrive.
It is amazing that you were neck and neck with Iwanki.
I bet you could run the real thing right now.
I mean, no matter how much you practice, you only have ten runners.
If even one of you caught a cold...
And even if you run like crazy and finish in the top ten,
There is no point in earning a seed for next year if you do not have enough runners.
Do not you wonder what you are running for?
It must be hard to stay motivated.
See you somewhere on the course.
You sure you guys are not connected by a red string of fate?
In some ways, he is diligent.
Consider it progress that no one responded.
Why did not you talk back to him?
I told you, I am searching for that answer right now.
Sakaki was probably trying to say
that improving yourself by competing against strong runners from strong schools
is how an athlete should be and is a reason to run.
Can you say what we are doing is wrong?
It is true that we need every one of us.
I do not know what will happen next year or the year after that.
I am sure those who empathize with us will follow.
All I can do is believe in that and run as hard as I can right now.
So there is no need to respond to him.
All we can do is acknowledge his points and move forward despite them.
We like what you have to say.
That feels like enough to me.
Do not be swayed by your emotions.
The twins are not theorists like you.
I would not call it a fight.
I understand what he is trying to say, but...
I want to accept what he is saying, but it feels like he tricked us.
We missed our opportunity to return to normal.
It is not like we were wrong, right?
I think you should believe him.
He is been patiently thinking for four years.
I can believe him because he is come this far.
Compared to all the time Haiji has spent on it,
our next two months will fly by in a moment.
And that moment could change your life,
even if you do not understand anything right now.
The last six months flew by, too.
The qualifier, the training camp, all the track meets.
She is been a huge help, like when Haiji collapsed.
And she always comes to our practices.
Without Hana, we would not have made it this far.
I wanted to discuss the roadside placement of our members.
Oh, and the university's asking us to turn in our forms.
I almost asked if he wanted my help.
It is shocking to know we cannot win.
But I was saved by Haiji's words.
All we can do right now is run as hard as we can.
Congratulations Kansei University Long Distance Track and Field Team
My anxieties have been eliminated completely.
Is there still something bothering you?
Sakaki made Jota and Joji anxious,
but the only thing I can do is run.
Previewing the course made me realize
that not you or Haiji, but I have to finish some section of it.
There are things only you can do.
Believe in us and in yourself.
Congratulations Kansei University Long Distance Track and Field Team
Hey, it is Kansei's Ekiden guys.
They have got an exchange student?
I wish they would run an all-Japanese team.
The school's probably paying for it to promote themselves.
What are you going to tell them?
